import React from 'react' import styles from './index.module.css' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' import Avatar from '../photo' import Photo from '../photo' function StructureTweet({name,mention,date,children}) { const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) return (
{name} @{mention} •{untilNow}

Content buraya gelecek

Footer Alanı
) } export default StructureTweet
